description: A premium dining experience with hot meals, appetizers, desserts and beverages delivered on tray or trolley—white‑glove presentation, available during scheduled hours or 24/7 in luxury hotels.
Staff‑handled laundry services including washing, dry‑cleaning, ironing, with express options and premium detergents.

Hotels often offer outdoor, indoor, rooftop or infinity pools available to guests—including separate sections for families and adults, complimentary towel service, safety supervision, poolside snacks/drinks, cabanas, and sometimes day‑pass options.
